title: Set Up an Email Suppression List
description: A company needs to ensure they do not email a list of competitors who have signed up for their newsletter. A marketer needs to create a suppression list.

tasks.description: Get the list of competitor email addresses to be suppressed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the list of emails to block.

tasks.description: In the email marketing platform, create a new suppression list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an empty suppression list.

tasks.description: Upload the list of competitor emails to the suppression list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the emails to the list, which will prevent them from receiving any future marketing emails.
